item.title: Hard Rolls
item.description: A German classic - Brötchen! The secret to very good ones is time and a poolish.

item.title: Brian's Baguettes
item.description: There are many baguette recipes, many bad ones, many good ones. Here is one that I like….

item.title: Brötchen
item.description: So mache ich derzeit meine klassischen Brötchen. Das Geheimrezept dabei ist Zeit und ein Vorteig.

item.title: Pizza Pizza Pizza!
item.description: Your pizza dough calculator for Neapolitan style hand shaped pizza.

item.title: Scalable Baking & Hugo
item.description: Some of the recipes I personally use. All are tested and working well. Of course you may need to adjust them slightly to your flour and your oven. Have fun and leave a comment if you like, or not like.
